headline: Why Analysts Believe Delta’s Story Is Shifting After Strong Results and New Price Targets
summary: Delta Air Lines stock has recently seen a reaffirmation of its fair value estimate at $71.75 per share, signaling analysts' steady confidence in the airline's long-term prospects. However, price targets have shifted upward, now ranging from $68 to $85 per share as analysts react to robust earnings and encouraging forecasts. Stay tuned to discover how you can monitor these evolving expectations and keep ahead of the changing narrative around Delta's valuation. Stay updated as the Fair Value...
